segments.text: Over to the left, I see two children engaged in some secret activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is perched precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks very unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so afraid it's going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet where a "COOKIE JAR" is visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep inside, clearly grabbing a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, her arm raised expectantly towards him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's waiting patiently for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's balanced, he could easily fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me anxious just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman has no idea this is happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little kitchen adventure is full of risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
